          <title>
            <string language="fi">Kaulintekniikka-kasvi</string>
            <string language="en">Rolling pin technique/plant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rollenstift technique/plant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Goupille technique/plant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pino do rolo technique/plant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perno di rolling technique/plant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνική/εγκαταστάσεις καρφιτσών κυλίσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Contacto de balanceo technique/plant</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten saveen voidaan painaa koristekuvioita kaulimen ja kasvinlehden avulla.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how decorative figures can be pressed into clay by means of a rolling pin and leaf.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clay</string>
            <string language="en">pin</string>
            <string language="en">lea</string>
            <string language="en">decorative</string>
            <string language="en">figures</string>
            <string language="en">rolling</string>
            <string language="en">pressing</string>
            <string language="fi">kaulintekniikka,</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityökasvatus</string>
            <string language="fi">plastinen</string>
            <string language="fi">koristelu</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
            <string language="fi">savi</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt, wie dekorative Abbildungen in
Lehm mittels eines Rollenstiftes und -blattes betätigt werden 
können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre comment des figures décoratives
peuvent être appuyées dans l'argile à l'aide d'une goupille et 
d'une feuille.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra como as figuras decorativas podem
ser pressionadas na argila por meio de um pino e de uma folha do rolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra come le figure decorative 
possono essere premute in argilla per mezzo di un perno e di un foglio
di rolling.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς οι διακοσμητικοί αριθμοί 
μπορούν να πατηθούν στον άργιλο με τη βοήθεια μιας κυλώντας 
καρφίτσας και ενός φύλλου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra cómo las figuras decorativas 
se pueden presionar en la arcilla por medio de un contacto y de una 
hoja de balanceo.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehm</string>
          </keyword>
